com.vmware.vapi.std.introspection

Class OperationApiInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vmware.vapi.provider.ApiMethodBasedApiInterface
      • com.vmware.vapi.internal.bindings.ApiInterfaceSkeleton
        • com.vmware.vapi.std.introspection.OperationApiInterface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ApiInterface

    public class OperationApiInterface
extends com.vmware.vapi.internal.bindings.ApiInterfaceSkeleton
    Implementation of ApiInterfaceSkeleton which adapts API service implementation (class that implements the generated OperationProvider interface).

    This adapter expects asynchronous/non-blocking API service implementation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OperationApiInterface

        public OperationApiInterface()
        Constructor. Creates an OperationApiInterface instance with default API service implementation.

        The default service implementation is assumed to be instance of the com.vmware.vapi.std.introspection.impl.OperationImpl class. This class will be loaded and instantiated.

      • OperationApiInterface

        public OperationApiInterface(Class<? extends OperationProvider> implClass)
        Constructor. Creates an OperationApiInterface instance for specified class of the API service implementation. The specified class will be instantiated.
        Parameters:
        implClass - The Class implementing OperationProvider API service. If null default implementation will be used as in OperationApiInterface().

      • OperationApiInterface

        public OperationApiInterface(OperationProvider impl)
        Constructor. Creates an OperationApiInterface instance for specified instance of the API service implementation.
        Parameters:
        impl - The implementation of OperationProvider API service. Must not be null.

      • OperationApiInterface

        public OperationApiInterface(OperationProvider impl,
                             com.vmware.vapi.internal.bindings.TypeConverter converter)
        Constructor. Creates an OperationApiInterface instance for specified instance of the API service implementation and custom conversion logic.
        Parameters:
        impl - The implementation of OperationProvider API service. Must not be null.
        converter - logic to convert from native to wire type and back. Must not be null.
